1: <pb/><e>Re li xjolomileb' laj b'ichanel. Xsaalm laj David.</e>
2: <pb/><t>At Qaawa',</t> <t>jo' najtil chik tinsachq sa' aach'ool?</t> <t>Ma chi junajwa?</t> <t>Jo' najtil chik taamuq aawib' chiwu?</t>
3: <t>Jo' najtil chik yooq ink'a'uxl</t> <t>ut yot'yooq li waanm chi q'eq ut chi kutan?</t> <t>Jo' najtil chik taanumtaaq sa' inb'een li xik' na'ilok we?</t>
4: <pb/><t>Chinaawil ut chinaasume, at Qaawa', at inYos!</t> <t>Toj taak'e xsaqenk xsa' li wu</t> <t>re naq min'ok chi wark sa' li kamk.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Mixye li xik' na'ilok we: “Xinnumtaak sa' xb'een!”,</t> <t>chi moko che'saho'q sa' xch'ool eb' li xik' neke'ilok we</t> <t>wi tine'ril chi t'ane'k!</t>
6: <pb/><t>A'ut laa'in k'ojk'o li waanm rik'in laarahom;</t> <t>k'ajo' xsahil linch'ool xb'aan naq xinaakol!</t> <t>A' li Qaawa' tinb'icha ru xb'aan naq xinrusila.</t> <t>Tinb'icha xk'ab'a' li Qaawa', li Nimajwal Yos.</t>
